mapper.insert: INSERT into event(event_id,duration, img, start_date, content,title,regdate,gu_id,user_id ) values(event_id_seq.nextval,#{duration},#{img},#{start_date},#{content},#{title},#{regdate},#{gu_id},#{user_id})
mapper.update: update event set title =#{title},start_date =#{start_date},duration =#{duration},gu_id =#{gu_id},content =#{content}, img =#{img} where event_id = #{event_id}
mapper.select: select event_id,title,writer,viewcnt from event where event_id >0 order by event_id desc, regdate desc
